analysis.description:
Reentrancy in MoldCoinBonus.buyWithBonus (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#309-324):
	External calls:
	- tokens = safeMul(msg.value,fundAddress.price(block.timestamp)) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#313)
	- fundAddress.buyRecipient.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#316)
	External calls sending eth:
	- fundAddress.buyRecipient.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#316)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusBalances (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#320)
	- bonusBalances (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#321)
	- totalSupply (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#318)

MoldCoin.price (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#179-185) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timeInSeconds <= secondStageDatetime (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#182)
	- timeInSeconds <= endDatetime (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#183)
	- timeInSeconds < startDatetime (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#180)
	- timeInSeconds <= firstStageDatetime (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#181)

MoldCoin.buyRecipient (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#197-212) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(safeAdd(saleTokenSupply,tokens) <= coinAllocation) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#201)

MoldCoin.allocateFounderTokens (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#215-224) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > endDatetime) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#216)

MoldCoin.arrangeUnsoldTokens (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#253-264) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(balances[holder] > 0) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#256)
	- require(bool)(safeAdd(saleTokenSupply,tokens) <= coinAllocation) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#255)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > endDatetime) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#254)

MoldCoin.decimals should be constant (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#124)
MoldCoin.name should be constant (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#122)
MoldCoin.symbol should be constant (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/35617.sol#123)
